summary: Frontend implements bilingual UI with language toggle, explore/list/detail pages, filters, and a new-recipe form using React Query hooks. Backend defines a Recipe model and basic CRUD-like queries, but seeding/persistence/search requirements are only partially met, and static asset requirements are not evidenced in the diff.

missing_requirements.requirement: Backend exposes methods to create, list, get-by-id, and search/filter recipes (including search by text).
missing_requirements.reason: Backend includes addRecipe, getRecipe, getAllRecipes, and simple cuisine/category filtering methods, but no text search method is implemented (and no combined search/filter API is evident).

missing_requirements.requirement: Recipe records persist across page refreshes/canister calls during runtime and are returned consistently by list/get APIs.
missing_requirements.reason: The recipe store and nextRecipeId are defined as non-stable variables (no stable storage shown), and there is no upgrade/state preservation logic; additionally, seeding is only called in postupgrade, not at initial deployment.

missing_requirements.requirement: A fresh deploy includes a non-empty recipe list without requiring any user input.
missing_requirements.reason: seedRecipes() is only invoked in system func postupgrade(), so initial deployment would not seed data unless an upgrade occurs.

missing_requirements.requirement: Seeded recipes cover at least 3 categories and at least 3 cuisines, and each has a photoAssetPath that resolves to an actual frontend static asset under the generated assets folder.
missing_requirements.reason: Only one seeded recipe is shown, and its photoAssetPath points to "/static/images/recipes/carbonara.jpg" rather than a frontend generated asset path (e.g., /assets/generated/...). No additional seeded recipes are present in the diff.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add generated static image assets under frontend/public/assets/generated (logo/hero and recipe photos).
missing_requirements.reason: UI references generated assets paths, but no added image files under frontend/public/assets/generated are shown in the diff summary (some files were omitted due to limits, so existence cannot be confirmed from provided evidence).

hallucinated_features.description: Internet Identity authentication provider/hooks added and wired into the app runtime.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly states authentication is not required; adding an Internet Identity provider and identity-dependent actor creation is beyond requested functionality (even though II is the only allowed provider if auth is needed).

hallucinated_features.description: Footer attribution link to an external site (caffeine.ai).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested in the BuildRequest requirements or acceptance criteria.
